Package org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.config

Class CRemoteHost

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.config.CLocalHost
org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.config.CRemoteHost
public class CRemoteHost extends CLocalHost
This class describes a host that is to be used to deploy/start/stop/undeploy a federate remotely using SSH.
